title: Australia's Santos sells December Cooper Basin crude at premium - sources
text:
Australia's Santos sells December Cooper Basin crude at premium - sources

Commodities 42 minutes ago (Oct 21, 2019 19:14)

© Reuters. Australia's Santos sells December Cooper Basin crude at premium - sources SINGAPORE, Oct 21 (Reuters) - * Australian oil and gas producer Santos Ltd has sold a cargo of December-loading Cooper Basin crude at a premium of around $8.00-8.50 a barrel to dated via a spot tender, two trade sources said on Monday * The buyer was likely trading house Vitol

Australia's Santos sells December Cooper Basin crude at premium - sources
